# mode

**Instance Property**

The display mode for a tab bar.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var mode: UITabBarController.Mode { get set }
```

## Discussion

On iPad, the display mode determines whether the system can display the tab bar as a sidebar. For more information, see [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/elevating-your-ipad-app-with-a-tab-bar-and-sidebar].

## Supporting the sidebar

- **UITabBarController.Mode**: A tab bar’s display mode.
- **sidebar**: A tab bar’s corresponding sidebar.
- **UITabBarController.Sidebar**: An object for managing and configuring the sidebar.
- **UITabSidebarItem**
- **UITabSidebarItem.Request**
- **UITabBarController.Sidebar.Animating**
